title: What happened to the downtown doorman, Craig Shepard(see article in previous interview by the STARNEWS) in Wilmington,nc? He was the best and always kept the Peace when WPD and New Hanover Sherriffs dept couldnt at 2am. I heard he was so successful that he retired at 44yrs old.I once watched him rescue WPD officers as well as Sheriffs deputies! Downtown nightlife isnt the same!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=15956
